definition: tip/end/final stage/latter part/inessential detail/powder/dust/opera role of old man
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
The Last Emperor, 1987 biopic of Pu Yi 溥儀|溥仪[Pu3 yi2] by Bernardo Bertolucci

sentences.english: He put on ice wearing the shoulder, he is proud of the last Cavalier.
sentences.chinese: 他把冰雪披戴在在肩膀，他是孤傲的末代王爵。

sentences.english: The ashes of Puyi, the Last Emperor, lie in the Babaoshan Cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 末代皇帝溥儀的骨灰被葬在八寶山。

sentences.english: Braga won the last ever UEFA Intertoto Cup in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 布拉加於2008年獲得末代託托杯冠軍。

sentences.english: They think the last bad emperor they had was Mao, " he said."
sentences.chinese: 中國人認爲，他們的末代昏君是毛。

sentences.english: We all have seen the film "The Last Emperor".
sentences.chinese: 我們大家都看過《末代皇帝》這部電影。

sentences.english: Tagore is pictured with China's last emperor Pu Yi in 1924.
sentences.chinese: 有1924年泰戈爾和末代皇帝溥儀的合影。

sentences.english: The Former Palaces of the Last Emperor was looted after the Japanese surrender.
sentences.chinese: 末代皇帝以前的宮殿在日本投降後被劫掠一空。

sentences.english: I also saw the movie'The Last Emperor'for many times. I like the movie so very much.
sentences.chinese: 我也很喜歡“末代皇帝”這部電影，並且看過很多遍。

sentences.english: The face of a polar bear pelt looms before the uniforms of China's last emperor, Puyi.
sentences.chinese: 北極熊熊皮的背後隱約可見中國末代皇帝溥儀的皇服。

sentences.english: When I say contemporary, I don’t really mean the latest emperor’s new clothes.
sentences.chinese: 當我說當代的時候，我並沒有指這是末代皇帝的新衣。

sentences.english: The last Imperial family was the Qing Imperial family Aisin Gioro and the last Chinese Emperor was Puyi.
sentences.chinese: 最後的皇室是清皇試冬愛新覺羅莢冬溥儀是末代天子。

sentences.english: The last emperor of Ming Dynasty, Chongzhen, committed suicide by hanging himself here in 1644.
sentences.chinese: 明朝的末代皇帝，崇禎在1644年於此上吊自殺。

definition: The Last Emperor, 1987 biopic of Pu Yi 溥儀|溥仪[Pu3 yi2] by Bernardo Bertolucci
(of the holder of an official post which no longer exists) the last (incumbent)
royal family/imperial household/member of the royal family
Manchurian Qing (refers to the Qing dynasty, esp. at its decline, or as an anti-Qing slogan)
the fifth (of series of numbered kings)
the Second (of numbered kings)/second generation (e.g. Chinese Americans)
